label: Construction Site
name: ConstructionSite
description: Click the lamps to activate them.

label: Ghost
name: Ghost
description: Hover over the ghost to trigger animation

label: Magic Ball
name: MagicBall
description: Click on the center of the ball to shuffle the texts.

label: Snail Race
name: SnailRace
description: Click on one of the GO-buttons, to trigger a movement.

label: Sundial
name: Sundial
description: Click on one the spheres to move the sun to it.

label: Traffic Light
name: TrafficLight
description: Left Traffic Light: Click on the button to start the sequence. Right Traffic Light: Click on the button to switch to next phase.

label: Puzzle
name: Puzzle
description: Select a puzzle piece and then click on one of the fields or spheres, to let move it to the position.

label: WhackAMole
name: WhackAMole
description: Click on the moles to get disappear them

label: Bow Shooting
name: BowShooting
description: Click at first on the ground plane to lock the angle, click again to select the strengh.

label: Physics Math
name: PhysicsMath
description: Optional: Click on a ball to reset the position.
